languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Прицельный{/g} выстрел наносит +{uip|DamageBonus|0b113627def5404cb1d94310c85edfb8}% урона дополнительно. traits.locale_text: A Deadeye shot deals an additional +(5 × Perception bonus)% damage. These ranged attack abilities gain deadeye shot benefits (× 1.5 range and additional damage from the talent itself): -Hunter's Slay the Game -Tactician's Finish the Job -Assasin's Death Wisper -Assasin's Killing Edge -Assasin's Dispatch -Adept's Dismantling Attack -Hunter's Wild Hunt

Deadeye shot deals an additional +(5 × PER bonus)% damage.
